ai-atk-s0305a11:137_0: At that, they haven’t fulfilled seven hundred eons.
ai-atk-s0305a11:139_0: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Cetis at Mahāvijita’s dwelling.
ai-atk-s0305a11:140_0: ‘That’s just what I meant for me.
ai-atk-s0305a11:141_0: that the world will be happy all in that.
ai-atk-s0305a11:143_0: by Good conduct, speech, and mind.
ai-atk-s0305a11:145_0: that’s who it’s cut off at the root.’
ai-atk-s0305a11:146_0: The word of the Buddhas instruments for a senior mendicant. For example that’s entirely full of adornments, bide, yawn trees with assurance, suspicious behavior, underhand, no true goal for which gentlemen rightly go forth from the lay life to homelessness.
ai-atk-s0305a11:148_0: While giving up purity, there is no purification of ethics.
ai-atk-s0305a11:149_0: ‘The Buddha’s name is withdrawn in heart,
ai-atk-s0305a11:150_0: Be the world free of light, the great hermit!”
ai-atk-s0305a11:152_0: The Book of the Ones is finished.
